Sentencas: In this study, the performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) fed with a reformate syngas mixture and having anode off-gas recirculation is done in terms of energy and exergy analyses.
Titulo: Analysis of reformate syngas mixture fed solid oxide fuel cell through experimental and 0-D thermodynamic modeling studies

Sentencas: In this regard, a zero-dimensional (0-D) mathematical model for SOFCs is developed.
Titulo: Analysis of reformate syngas mixture fed solid oxide fuel cell through experimental and 0-D thermodynamic modeling studies

Sentencas: This model is validated by the results of the in-house experimental studies.
Titulo: Analysis of reformate syngas mixture fed solid oxide fuel cell through experimental and 0-D thermodynamic modeling studies

Sentencas: In addition, parametric studies are carried out to assess the effect of operating parameters on fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Analysis of reformate syngas mixture fed solid oxide fuel cell through experimental and 0-D thermodynamic modeling studies

Sentencas: The results show that the proposed model is very agreeable with experimental studies.
Titulo: Analysis of reformate syngas mixture fed solid oxide fuel cell through experimental and 0-D thermodynamic modeling studies

Sentencas: The maximum error found in the validated model is 6.8% at the operating temperature of 800 & DEG;C.
Titulo: Analysis of reformate syngas mixture fed solid oxide fuel cell through experimental and 0-D thermodynamic modeling studies

Sentencas: In addition, it is shown that the anode off-gas recirculation ratio does not have a significant effect on the performance of the SOFC at low current densities.
Titulo: Analysis of reformate syngas mixture fed solid oxide fuel cell through experimental and 0-D thermodynamic modeling studies

Sentencas: Furthermore, the exergy destruction rate of SOFC increases by 23.2% under the high current density condition (i = 1.4 A/cm2) when the fuel utilization ratio increases from 0.75 to 0.95. & COPY; 2022 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Analysis of reformate syngas mixture fed solid oxide fuel cell through experimental and 0-D thermodynamic modeling studies
